.

.
s <br/> test
.
<p>s <br> test</p>
.

.
s <br /> test
.
<p>s <br> test</p>
.

.
a | b <br> | in a table
.
<p>a | b <br> | in a table</p>
.

.
bold with ** a line <br> break in the middle ** of it
.
<p>bold with ** a line <br> break in the middle ** of it</p>
.

*~f
.
<p>*~f</p>
.

.
s <BR> test
.
<p>s &lt;BR&gt; test</p>
.
